```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data<-as_tibble(expand.grid(c(1:6)*5, c(0:5)*10+25))

```

```{r}
data<-data %>% mutate(value=Var1*Var2)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x=Var2, y=reorder(Var1,-Var1), fill=value)) + 
  geom_tile()+
  scale_fill_distiller(name = "Aylık\nGelir", palette = "Reds", direction = 1)
```
